ConvertCsvToDataTable(string, char)

Converts a CSV file to a DataTable.

public static DataTable ConvertCsvToDataTable(string path, char delimiter = ',')

Parameters

path string

The path of the CSV file.

delimiter char

The delimiter used in the CSV file. Default is ','.

Returns

DataTable

A DataTable containing the data from the CSV file.

ConvertCsvToObject<T>(Stream, char, bool)

Converts a CSV file to a list of objects of type T.

public static List<T> ConvertCsvToObject<T>(Stream stream, char delimiter = ',', bool ignoreCaseHeader = false)

Parameters

stream Stream

The stream containing the CSV data.

delimiter char

The delimiter used to separate values in the CSV file. Default is ','.

ignoreCaseHeader bool

If true, the header is case insensitive. Default is false.

Returns

List<T>

A list of objects of type T.

Type Parameters

T

The type of objects to convert to.

ConvertTextToCSV(string, char, char, string[]?)

Converts a text file to a CSV file.

public static byte[] ConvertTextToCSV(string pathToTxt, char delimiter = ',', char saveDelimiter = ',', string[]? headers = null)

Parameters

pathToTxt string

The path to the input text file.

delimiter char

The character used to separate values in the text file. Default is ','.

saveDelimiter char

The character used to separate values in the CSV file. Default is ','.

headers string[]

Returns

byte[]

True if the conversion is successful, false otherwise.
